mapper.insert: insert all into time(cont_kind,cont_no,time_kind,time_date) values( #{cont_kind},#{task_no},'s',TO_DATE(#{task_start_date},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') ) into time(cont_kind,cont_no,time_kind,time_date) values( #{cont_kind},#{task_no},'e',TO_DATE(#{task_end_date},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') ) select * from dual
mapper.select: select A.*,timeline.*,member.mem_name from (select A.task_no,A.task_state,A.task_content,A.task_priority,(A.time_date) as task_start_date,(time.time_date) as task_end_date from ( select * from task t left join time ti on t.task_no = ti.cont_no where ti.time_kind = 's') A left join time on A.task_no = time.cont_no where time.time_kind ='e') A left join timeline on timeline.cont_no = A.task_no left join member on timeline.mem_no = member.mem_no where timeline.cont_kind = 'task' order by task_no desc

select t.*,c.task_start_date,c.task_end_date from task t left join (select * from (select (A.time_date) as task_end_date,(B.time_date) as task_start_date,(a.cont_no) as s_cont_no,(b.cont_no) as e_cont_no from (select * from time where cont_kind = 'task' and cont_no = #{task_no} and time_kind = 's') B left join (select * from time where cont_kind = 'task' and cont_no = #{task_no} and time_kind = 'e') A on A.cont_no = B.cont_no) A ) C on t.task_no = c.s_cont_no or t.task_no = c.e_cont_no where task_no = #{task_no}
